message.body: Heyyy chica, john wants to collaborate with a visual artist on a project that involves joint improvisation between the musician(s) and the artist. I thought you would be the perfect person for him to work with. Does this interest you? It's not for the near future...
Yes. I love you. I want you In Boston
And I'm A little drunk right nor
haha i love you too! Hope it's a celebratory drunk :P
Im giving john your number. He'll be in boston next sunday/monday am so maybe you can chat over a cup of coffee? He got super excited when i said i thought you'd be down
